short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simplified version of the PromptlyReply tool for users to interact with the system easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The PromptlyReply chrome extension is an additional tool for the users of PromptlyReply.com. 

The chrome extension offers a minified version of the PromptlyReply tool that allows you to access the platform more conveniently from any web page.
